title: Maya Jama flaunts her incredible curves in skimpy bikinis during wild girls' trip to Dubai
text:
She's newly single after her long-term romance with rapper Stormzy came to an end two months ago.

And Maya Jama is making the most of her new status, hitting Dubai this week for a break with her closest girlfriends.

The TV and radio star has been sharing sizzling snaps from her trip for her 1.1million Instagram fans, posing up a storm in a series of skimpy bikinis.

Loving life: Maya Jama has been sharing sizzling Instagram photos from her girls' trip top Dubai this week, flaunting her incredible figure in skimpy swimwear

Maya, 25, posted one racy snap to her grid on Wednesday as she posed by her luxury hotel's pool in a tiny purple bikini top.

She teamed the skimpy swimwear with purple snakeskin trousers and a matching shirt, completing her look with flawless hair and makeup as she captioned the snap: 'GOD BLESS THE GLAM SQUAD.'

Later in the day the Radio 1 star shared a video clip of herself enjoying the sunshine n another tiny bikini top, this time in a peach shade.

Strike a pose: On Wednesday the Radio 1 star posed in a series of colourful bikinis for a day by the pool with her girlfriends

Another day, another bikini: It looks like Maya and her pals are having the time of their lives in the celeb-favourite destination

It looks like Maya and her pals are having the time of their lives in the celeb-favourite destination, hitting the local clubs and making friends with fellow tourists around the pool.

During a new interview on The Jonathan Ross Show last week Maya declared she is loving single life.

The newly single DJ, 25, said that she's not on any dating apps or looking for a new flame two months on from the split during a candid chat - which will air on Saturday.

Single: Maya revealed during an interview on The Jonathan Ross Show last week that she isn't 'on the hunt' and is happy being single - two months after splitting from Stormzy

She said: 'I'm not on the hunt. I'm not on any apps, basically. No, I'm not prowling. I'm just living my life. [I've just bought my first house] it's really exciting.

'I'm trying to make it into MTV Cribs… I want to get a pole from my bedroom down to my front room, that's part of my plan... Single life is good. I'm just working.'

The BBC Radio 1 host, who looked fantastic on the BBC chat show wearing a leather jumpsuit, confirmed her split from Vossi Bop rapper Stormzy in August.

The notoriously private couple dated for four years but are said to have ended their relationship in order to focus on their careers.

Former flame: Presenter Maya and the rapper split after four years together in August (pictured 2017)

Maya and Stormzy first went public with their romance in 2016 after initially keeping their relationship private.

Since splitting Maya has been candid about not wanting to jump back into the dating game, even saying she is 'scared to date'.

In an interview with the Evening Standard magazine she said: 'I’m scared to date. I haven’t been single in so long, how the f*** do you flirt any more?!'

Maya noted: ‘I live on my own now. Solo b***h. I’ve got this little [flat] that reminds me of a Sex and the City apartment. But without the sex.’
description: The TV and radio star has been sharing sizzling snaps from her trip for her 1.1million Instagram fans, posing up a storm in a series of skimpy bikinis.
